channel.title: fuse on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in fuse on Bodacious Blog

item.title: Creating FUSE filesystems in Python
item.description: Summary I wanted to find a simple way to create FUSE filesystems in Python3. I found that support in Python2 was good, as in this gist (https://gist.github.com/wettenhj/7019100), but it appears that direct bindings in Python3 no longer exist and the way these days is to build a pyfilesystem2 extension and then mount it with fusefs. I don’t like this, so I may choose to use another language or go back to python2 for this one application.
